DEFAULT_TENANT.description: Used for setting the default tenant

PORT.description: Used to specify the port number the server will listen on

HOST.description: Used to specify the host address

KAFKA_TOPIC_INCOMING.description: Used for the incoming Kafka topic

KAFKA_TOPIC_OUTGOING.description: Used for the outgoing Kafka topic

KAFKA_TOPIC_INCOMING_REPLY.description: Used for the incoming reply Kafka topic

KAFKA_TOPIC_INCOMING_DEAD_LETTER.description: Used for the incoming dead letter Kafka topic

KAFKA_GROUP_ID.description: Used for the Kafka consumer group ID

KAFKA_URL.description: Used to specify the Kafka brokers' URLs

KAFKA_CLIENT_ID.description: Used to specify the Kafka client ID

KAFKA_SASL_MECHANISM.description: Used to specify the SASL mechanism

KAFKA_USERNAME.description: Used to specify the Kafka SASL username

KAFKA_PASSWORD.description: Used to specify the Kafka SASL password

KAFKA_CERT_PATH.description: Used to specify the path to Kafka certificates

KAFKA_SSL.description: Used to specify if SSL is enabled for Kafka

PRIVATE_KEY_PATH.description: Used to specify the path to the private key file

JWT_SECRET.description: Used to specify the JWT secret key
